text: The sister, able to swim, had returned to the shore, but instead of returning to her brother-in-law (with whom she had an illicit relationship), she went to her fiance's house and confessed everything. Her fiance reported her to the police, and then jumped off a cliff near Monte Carlo.
handwritten_text: The sister, able to swim, had returned to the shore, but instead of returning to her brother-in-law (with whom she had an illicit relationship), she went to her fiance's house and confessed everything. Her fiance reported her to the police, and then jumped off a cliff near Monte Carlo.
